com.firebase.jobdispatcher

Class Job.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.firebase.jobdispatcher.Job.Builder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobParameters
    Enclosing class:
    Job

    public static final class Job.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobParameters
    A class that understands how to build a Job. Retrieved by calling FirebaseJobDispatcher.newJobBuilder().
